body_html: @ezyang , would it be possible to resolve this issue soon? PR #183 in TC repo is pending lawyers decision on how to include a BSD file in the repo but if we could get this file from the submodule, then we don't need to wait for the lawyers and can merge the PR soon without worrying about any license issues.

body: @ezyang , would it be possible to resolve this issue soon? PR #183 in TC repo is pending lawyers decision on how to include a BSD file in the repo but if we could get this file from the submodule, then we don't need to wait for the lawyers and can merge the PR soon without worrying about any license issues.
